name: Fightocracy 2012
description:
The US election is here! It's time for Obama and Romney to face off against not only each other - but some formidable past presidential masters.

Fightocracy 2012 is an arcade-style presidential fighting game. Choose your candidate - Barack Obama or Mitt Romney - and face some of the most notorious former US presidents in an epic battle for the White House!

• Choose from nine former presidents as well as the two current presidential candidates in free play mode!

• No in-app purchases - everything included with first purchase.

• Original score directed by Eiceph.

• Four stunning levels to battle on, each with it's own theme tune.

• Challenging gameplay with achievements and global leader boards.
